name: Verify that Get todos endpoint returns a "todo" object by id
description: As I user, I want to get a specific "todo" object from the GoRest API

steps.name: When I call the Get "todos" endpoint option with parameters
Then I receive the response and validate with "Get_todo" file
And I validate the status code is 200

fullName: Todos: Verify that Get todos endpoint returns a "todo" object by id
